name: miscopy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to copy something wrongly: The scribes sometimes miscopied numbers or made other mistakes. They frequently miscopied, as very often they were not familiar with the language being copied.
More examplesFewer examplesThe probability of any particular letter being miscopied on any one occasion is extremely low.Errors may be made in recording the measurements or in miscopying the text on the drawing.He miscopied a note in the melody.The scribe forgot to cross out the miscopied note.
